text: The Four Musketeers is a 1974 Spanish Panamanian British American adventure movie directed by Richard Lester and was based on the 1844 novel by Alexandre Dumas and is the sequel of the 1973 movie The Three Musketeers. It stars Michael York, Oliver Reed, Frank Finlay, Richard Chamberlain, Jean-Pierre Cassel, Geraldine Chaplin, Charlton Heston, Faye Dunaway, Christopher Lee, Raquel Welch, Roy Kinnear and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1975. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1974 adventure movies Category:Spanish adventure movies Category:Panamanian movies Category:British adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Lester
title: The Four Musketeers (movie)
